name: Territorial Bancorp Inc.
description: Territorial Bancorp Inc. is a bank holding company headquartered in Hawaii, focused on providing a comprehensive range of financial services to individuals and businesses. Founded in 2000, the company operates through its wholly-owned subsidiary, Territorial Savings Bank, which has been serving the community since 1921. The bank offers a variety of products including savings accounts, checking accounts, certificates of deposit, loans, and mortgage services. Territorial Bancorp is committed to fostering strong relationships with its customers and enhancing the economic well-being of the communities it serves. With a focus on personalized service, the bank aims to meet the unique financial needs of its diverse clientele. Additionally, Territorial Bancorp emphasizes community involvement and supports local initiatives, reflecting its dedication to being a responsible corporate citizen. The company is publicly traded on the NASDAQ under the ticker symbol TBNK and has a steady growth trajectory, demonstrating a solid performance in the competitive banking sector.

seo.meta_title: Territorial Bancorp Inc. | Community-Focused Banking Solutions
seo.meta_description: Explore Territorial Bancorp Inc., a Hawaii-based bank holding company dedicated to providing personalized financial services to individuals and businesses. Learn about our products, community involvement, and commitment to customer satisfaction.

faq.question: What services does Territorial Bancorp offer?
faq.answer: Territorial Bancorp offers a range of financial services including deposit accounts, loans, and mortgage services.

faq.question: Where is Territorial Bancorp headquartered?
faq.answer: Territorial Bancorp is headquartered in Honolulu, Hawaii, USA.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Territorial Bancorp?
faq.answer: Alan S. Yokoyama is the CEO of Territorial Bancorp Inc.
